findings.title: Insecure function naming in getMintTxConfirmations
findings.description: The function name 'getMintTxConfirmations' does not align with its functionality and naming conventions of other functions in the contract. It is recommended to rename it to something like 'getSubmitStakingRewardTxConfirmations'.

findings.title: Potential arithmetic overflow/underflow issues
findings.description: Using safemath for arithmetic operation to prevent overflow/underflow issues.

findings.title: Unreturned value in claimReward() function
findings.description: The function claimReward() expects a return value for uint256 userReward but none is returned and hence raises a compilation warning.

findings.title: Shadowed variables in ERC20Capped and ERC20Detailed constructors
findings.description: Variables are shadowed in the constructors of ERC20Capped and ERC20Detailed.

findings.title: Shadowed variables in DefiERC20 constructor
findings.description: The DefiERC20 constructor shadows variables from ERC20Detailed and ERC20Capped.
